attributes.action: Adopt simple green solution to congestion that doesn’t involve increases in tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A substantial proportion of daily commutes involve office workers travelling in order to sit and work at a PC.  By offering companies genuine tax incentives to encourage teleworking many of these journeys will no longer be necessary.  The benefits speak for themselves. It would be refreshing if this government could deviate from its usual response to environmental issue and for once, not tax it.
